title: Bobby Faces Listener's Accusation + Eddie's ‘Surprise’ For Bobby’s Bachelor Party + Riddle Me This: Who Will Be The June Riddlemaster?
itunes:title: Bobby Faces Listener's Accusation + Eddie's ‘Surprise’ For Bobby’s Bachelor Party + Riddle Me This: Who Will Be The June Riddlemaster?
description:
Bobby defends himself after a listener accused him of spoiling a movie. He was very passionate in his defense of not being labeled a ‘spoiler’. Eddie reveals that he’s been planning something about Bobby’s bachelor party and it doesn’t go over how he planned. We play a round of Riddle Me This to find this month’s Riddle Master!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
